column4: Anyone know some about webcams? I am having problems with my Logitech camera, I think it want to use something called V4L2 I think I kind of tinkered into it and made it.. hmm.. well lets say it might be the user and not the system that was the problem here.. though now I have a black screen at best, any hints something to remove/add and so on?
it is not working in cheese, (and/or skype, amsn, luvcview.. skype..)
I think I kind of have "destroyed" something while trying.. and shoudl probably get a fresh start.. but to reinstall all the system feel a bit .. well I prefer not to
